name: Urban Bingo
overview:
Urban Bingo is a phone app that is part bingo board and part scavenger hunt.

Urban Bingo lets you compete against friends, customers or fellow event attendees to complete a 4x4 game board centered around a theme, place or event. Users take and upload a photo corresponding to the item on each tile. Fill a row, column or diagonal within the given game time limit for a chance to win VIP tickets, discounts, merchandise, and other prizes.

The best part? We let users customize their own game boards on UrbanBingo.com, so they can take the competition anywhere in the world to battle their friends for bragging rights.

Urban Bingo provides businesses, brands and event organizers with an interactive platform to engage customers. Games can be created and made available to Urban Bingo users to incentivize customer loyalty, promote speakers and sponsors, and enhance the customer or attendee experience through play, competition, and social interaction.
